price: 20. Mpe soki bolamu na ngolu ya Allah ezalaka likolo na bino te, ya sólo Allah azali wa ngolu atonda mawa.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha raūfun raḥīmun
